txt.en: Defeat All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You're supposed to be hiding.'
A group of Barkhûshim leap out to ambush you
'I've always wondered, how would a mountain try to hide? Now I know.'
'Sieze him! We shall bring him to Karâshna Zíri.'
'I am hiding.'
Defeated All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Well you don't have to be rude about it.'
'Quickly, [placeholder]! Run!
Move to meet Numûru and Razâl outside the Angar Aragín, the tower of Kûr Anzar at the top of the city.
'I may not be good at hiding, but you do not want to see this mountain angered, Razâl.'
A group of Okhíso's personal guard step out, ready to do battle!
'Over here, friend! I've gathered the barricades. Set them alight!'
Defeated Okhíso's personal guards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect grain sacks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy racks of weapons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Listen to Mizâdi and Okhíso
Defeat Barkhûshim sentries ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Assist Razâl and Numûru on a mission into Kûr Anzar to weaken the Barkhûshim.
Speak with Numûru outside Kûr Anzar.
Listen to Okhíso's dying words
Speak with Mizâdi in the tower
Descend and leave the tower of Kûr Anzar
Defeat Okhíso's guards and archers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You spy Okhíso with his archers and personal guard
Defeat Okhiso
Barricades set on fire ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso
Speak with Numûru
Defeat All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Razâl

'I almost feel bad for the Barkhûshim, now that I've got Numûru a bit stirred up.

'I will also soften your resistance. My sword arm may be slow but it helps when the enemy doesn't see it coming. You should move through the city, taking back their ill-gotten grain stores and destroying their weapons as the opportunity arises. Make sure to defeat their sentries, lest they call out our presence here. 

'We will meet again at the top of Kur Anzar, near the Angar Aragín.'
Move further into Kûr Anzar
Defeat Okhíso's personal guards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A group of All-seeing cultists scramble to confront you!
Listen to Numûru and Razâl's conversation
Defeated All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Meet Numûru and Razâl outside the tower of Kûr Anzar
TBD
'There will be time for talk later. We must get outside, and quickly. We must save Kûr Anzar and her people!'
Sabotage the Barkhûshim forces in Kûr Anzar by taking grain sacks, destroying weapon stands and defeating Barkhûshim sentries.
Speak with Razâl outside Kûr Anzar.
Collected grain sacks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Razâl near Angar Aragín, the tower of Kûr Anzar.
Destroyed weapon racks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Barkhûshim sentries ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I will move ahead and clear our path.'
Set fire to the barricades near the tower
Speak with Numûru and Razâl near the entrance before advancing further
Listen to Numûru
Speak with Razâl
Move further into Kûr Anzar.
Move closer to speak with Numûru and Razâl
Defeated Okhíso's guards and archers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Set fire to the barricades near the tower.
Listen to Numûru near Angar Aragín.
Listen to Okhíso's dying words.
Okhíso and Mizâdi draw their swords
Finish your ascent at the tower room to confront Okhíso
Speak with Mizâdi in the tower.
Descend and leave the tower of Kûr Anzar at its base.
'No! They've taken him!'
Move closer to speak with Numûru and Razâl.
Instance: Sabotaging Kûr Anzar
Move further into Kûr Anzar.
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso
Listen to Numûru and Razâl's conversation.
